tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EquipmentMaintenanceSchedule (
  equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_date DATE,
  estimated_cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  technician_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceSchedule (
  schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id UUID REFERENCES Equipment(equipment_id),
  maintenance_type STRING,
  due_date DATE,
  status STRING
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLog (
  log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  schedule_id UUID REFERENCES MaintenanceSchedule(schedule_id),
  log_date DATE,
  technician_name STRING,
  notes STRING
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_tasks (
    task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    task_name VARCHAR(255),
    task_description TEXT,
    task_due_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES equipment(equipment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    task_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_duration INT,
    maintenance_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES maintenance_tasks(task_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    next_maintenance_date DATE,
    last_maintenance_task_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (equipment_id) REFERENCES equipment(equipment_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (last_maintenance_task_id) REFERENCES maintenance_tasks(task_id)
);
CREATE TABLE equipment ( equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, equipment_name STRING, manufacturer STRING, purchase_date DATE, maintenance_interval INT );
CREATE TABLE maintenance_schedule ( schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY, equipment_id INT REFERENCES equipment(equipment_id), scheduled_maintenance_date DATE, completed BOOLEAN );

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records ( record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, schedule_id INT REFERENCES maintenance_schedule(schedule_id), maintenance_details STRING, technician_name STRING, maintenance_date DATE );
CREATE TABLE downtime_logs ( log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, equipment_id INT REFERENCES equipment(equipment_id), downtime_start DATETIME, downtime_end DATETIME, reason STRING );
CREATE TABLE operational_costs ( cost_id INT PRIMARY KEY, equipment_id INT REFERENCES equipment(equipment_id), maintenance_cost DECIMAL, downtime_cost DECIMAL, total_cost DECIMAL );
